title: $:/plugins/aaldrich/task-manager
author: Alan Aldrich
name: task-manager
readme:
*required: 

**~TiddlyTables plugin

**add //priority// to tbl-column-list of $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit

**add //status// to tbl-column-list of $:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/anything

**click here to patch automatically: <$button>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/anything" $field="tbl-column-list" $subfilter="status"/>
<$action-listops $tiddler="$:/plugins/aaldrich/tables/template/body/edit" $field="tbl-column-list" $subfilter="priority"/>
Fix Templates</$button>
